java/liquibase/log/LogFactory.java

00001 package liquibase.log;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 import java.util.logging.FileHandler;
00005 import java.util.logging.Handler;
00006 import java.util.logging.Level;
00007 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00008 import java.util.logging.SimpleFormatter;
00009 
00010 public class LogFactory {
00011     public static Logger getLogger() {
00012         return Logger.getLogger("liquibase");
00013     }
00014 
00015   public static void setLoggingLevel(String logLevel) {
00016     if ("all".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00017       getLogger().setLevel(Level.ALL);
00018     } else if ("finest".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00019       getLogger().setLevel(Level.FINEST);
00020     } else if ("finer".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00021       getLogger().setLevel(Level.FINER);
00022     } else if ("fine".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00023       getLogger().setLevel(Level.FINE);
00024     } else if ("info".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00025       getLogger().setLevel(Level.INFO);
00026     } else if ("warning".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00027       getLogger().setLevel(Level.WARNING);
00028     } else if ("severe".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00029       getLogger().setLevel(Level.SEVERE);
00030     } else if ("off".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00031       getLogger().setLevel(Level.OFF);
00032     } else {
00033       throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown log level: " + logLevel);
00034     }
00035   }
00036   
00037   
00042   public static void setLoggingLevel(String logLevel, String logFile) {
00043           Handler fH;
00044           
00045           try {
00046                   fH = new FileHandler(logFile);
00047           } catch (IOException e) {
00048                   throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot open log file "+logFile+". Reason: "+e.getMessage());
00049           }
00050 
00051           fH.setFormatter(new SimpleFormatter());
00052           getLogger().addHandler(fH);
00053           getLogger().setUseParentHandlers(false);
00054           setLoggingLevel(logLevel);
00055           
00056   } // end of method setLoggingLevel(String logLevel, String logFile)
00057   
00058 }
